Uses of Class
org.apache.sis.coverage.SampleDimension.Builder

Packages that use SampleDimension.Builder
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.coverage
Functions that associates positions within a bounded space (its domain) to values (its range).
org.apache.sis.coverage.grid
A coverage backed by a regular grid.
org.apache.sis.storage.modifier
A plugin mechanism for modifying some aspects of the resources read by data stores.
